trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when Jarund hits with it (included in the attack).

action.name: Warhammer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage, or 15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) bludgeoning damage when used with two hands.

action.name: Shield
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage, and Jarund pushes the target 5 feet away from him if it's Large or smaller. Jarund then enters the space vacated by the target. If the target is pushed to within 5 feet of a creature friendly to Jarund, that creature can make an attack against the target as a reaction.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage.
